attributes.action: Reduce the Number of Local Councillors
attributes.additional_details:
Reduce the Number of Local Councillors in Leeds we have 99 Councillors, 33 wards and each ward has three Councillors. This is a massive burden on the public purse. We do not need more than one Councillor per ward.
I am sure other toens and cities also have far to many Councillors all costing us a small fortune in addtion many also have town Councillors which is an added cost.
